SEARCH

Class UPCA

java.lang.Object
UPCA
public class UPCA extends Object
UPCA Barcode class which is capable of encoding/decoding UPCA barcodes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    barcode
    String barcode: stores UPCA barcodes as 1's and 0's in a String.
    private int
    checkdigit
    int checkdigit: stores the check digit of a UPCA product code as an int.
    private static final Map<String,Integer>
    map_deconding_first_six
    map_deconding_first_six: used for decoding the first six digits of a product code from a UPCA barcode.
    private static final Map<String,Integer>
    map_deconding_last_six
    map_deconding_last_six: used for decoing the last six digits of a product code from a UPCA barcode
    private static final Map<Integer,String>
    map_encoding_first_six
    map_encoding_first_six: used for encoding the first six digits of a product code into a UPCA barcode.
    private static final Map<Integer,String>
    map_encoding_last_six
    map_encoding_last_six: used for encoding the last six digits of a product code into a UPCA barcode
    private String
    product_code
    String product_code: stores the product_code of UPCA barcodes as a String.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    convertBarcodeToProductCode()
    void convertBarcodeToProductCode: uses the barcode member and the appropriate decoding map member to convert the barcode member to a product code, then assigns it to the product_code member.
    void
    convertProductCodeToBarcode()
    void convertProductCodeToBarcode: uses the product code member variable and using the appropiate encoding map, converts the product code to a barcode and stores the result in the barcode member.
    int
    getCheckdigit()
    int getCheckdigit: returns the private member checkdigit.
    String
    getProductCode()
    String getProductCode: returns the private member product_code.
    void
    setBarcode(String barcode)
    void setBarcode: sets the private member variable barcode to the passed String.
    void
    setCheckDigit()
    void setCheckDigit: Finds the check digit for a given product code and assigns it to the checkdigit member.
    void
    setProduct_code(String product_code)
    void setProduct_code: sets the product code if it is valid otherwise it sets the product to null.
    boolean
    valiateCheckDigit()
    boolean valiateCheckDigit: uses the member product code generated from the decoding process and gets resulting valid check digit and compares that to the previously assigned checkdigit.

    • setProduct_code

      public void setProduct_code(String product_code)
      void setProduct_code: sets the product code if it is valid otherwise it sets the product to null.
      Parameters:
      product_code - : a string to be set to the private member product_code.

    • convertProductCodeToBarcode

      public void convertProductCodeToBarcode()
      void convertProductCodeToBarcode: uses the product code member variable and using the appropiate encoding map, converts the product code to a barcode and stores the result in the barcode member.

    • setCheckDigit

      public void setCheckDigit()
      void setCheckDigit: Finds the check digit for a given product code and assigns it to the checkdigit member.

    • convertBarcodeToProductCode

      public void convertBarcodeToProductCode()
      void convertBarcodeToProductCode: uses the barcode member and the appropriate decoding map member to convert the barcode member to a product code, then assigns it to the product_code member.

    • valiateCheckDigit

      public boolean valiateCheckDigit()
      boolean valiateCheckDigit: uses the member product code generated from the decoding process and gets resulting valid check digit and compares that to the previously assigned checkdigit.
      Returns:
      returns a boolean expression comparing equality between the temp check digit and the member check digit.

    • getCheckdigit

      public int getCheckdigit()
      int getCheckdigit: returns the private member checkdigit.
      Returns:
      returns checkdigit

      String getProductCode: returns the private member product_code.
      Returns:
      returns product_code
